text_paragraphs: Information Note on the Court’s case-law 14
The case concerns the length of proceedings brought by the applicant in June 1994 and still pending. The proceedings have therefore lasted around 5 years 6 months.
Article 41: The Court awarded the applicant 600,000 escudos (PTE) in respect of non-pecuniary damage and 250,000 escudos in respect of costs and expenses.

© Council of Europe/European Court of Human Rights
This summary by the Registry does not bind the Court.
